## Hasher class

The universal hash function used by `Set` and `Map`<!-- -->.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare class Hasher 
```

## Methods

|  Method | Modifiers | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  [combine(value)](./calcium.hasher.combine.md) |  | Adds the given value to this hasher, mixing its essential parts into the hasher state. |
|  [finalize()](./calcium.hasher.finalize.md) |  | Finalizes the hasher state and returns the hash value. |
